column4: Would someone be able to explain to me why even though ubuntu is advertised to run basic programs, and even some games faster than windows, ubuntu actually runs significantly slower? Also would someone be able to help me improve my performance?
where have ubuntu been advertised to run windows games faster than windows itself? :o url!
yeah that is pretty common "it has been advertised" and the next thing people say "well I dont remember exactly where" etc
I've seen cannabis advertised as a drug equally lethal with heroin :O
